text: Dustin Renton Melton (born 11 April 1995) is an English-South African cricketer. He made his first-class debut on 29 August 2019, for Derbyshire against Australia, during Australia's tour of England. He made his Twenty20 debut on 11 September 2020, for Derbyshire in the 2020 t20 Blast. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:South African cricketers Category:Derbyshire cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Harare Category:University of Pretoria alumni Category:English cricketers
title: Dustin Melton
